org.neverfear.whois
Interface ServerResolver

All Known Implementing Classes:
CannotResolve, ResolveAfilias, ResolveCRSNIC, ResolveDefault, ResolvePIR, ResolveURL
public interface ServerResolver

An interface representing a WHOIS server resolver that can be queried.

Author:
doug@neverfear.org

Method Summary

          Query the server for the given name.
